alert.note: Alert for Big Island Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued May 04 at 3:17AM HST until May 04 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY FOR BIG ISLAND SUMMITS UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... .Deep moisture will combine with a low aloft to bring periods of wintry precipitation to the Big Island Summits, mainly this afternoon. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Big Island Summits. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Dangerously slick roadways.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet, or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Be prepared for slippery roads and limited visibilities and use caution while driving.
